email_text:
Subject: Urgent Action Required: Update Your Payment Information

Dear Valued Amazon Customer,

We are writing to inform you that there is an issue with the payment information on your Amazon account. In order to continue enjoying our services and making purchases, we kindly ask you to update your credit card details as soon as possible.

Please click on the link below to securely update your payment information:
[Phishing link]

Failure to update your payment information may result in the suspension or closure of your Amazon account. We understand that this may be inconvenient, but it is necessary to ensure the security and integrity of our platform.

Thank you for your immediate attention to this matter. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact our customer service team.

Sincerely,
The Amazon Team
